QuestData.Title: Bolstering the Defenses
QuestData.Description: This island is a dangerous place, $n. We have to worry about attacks from the Zandalari, mogu, saurok, and worst of all the Sunreavers.$b$bI had perimeter wards placed on the outskirts of our camp for additional protection. In their current state they will only injure an attacker, but I'm done with warnings!$b$bWith your help we can super-charge the wards into a more deadly defense system.
QuestData.LogDescription: Empower 6 Kirin Tor Perimeter Wards around Violet Rise.
